QuestData.Title: An Ancient Empire
QuestData.Description: My brothers speak of an ancient mogu empire that once dwelled in the ruins to the east.$B$BOnce, this tribe knew untold secrets of sorcery and subjugation.$B$BI have a curious mind, Wakener, and I wish to learn of the empires that ruled after my time.$B$BKnowledge of the past will determine our future.$B$BGo search the ruins for their ancient tablets. I will study their secrets and make them our own.
